name: NEVRDEAD Demo
detailed_description:
"For nearly a millennia, heaven and hell have been at balance. The horrors of hell were confined in anguish while peace blossomed across the known world. Only mortals could disturb this balance, for which mortals will only come to repent.." Nevalem

NEVRDEAD is a old school, run-and-gun fast paced shooter survival. There is more that meets the eye though in this world, skill progression, base building, or just survival - the choice is yours. Hell, if your strong enough you could even challenge Satan! In the end just survive, you only got one chance.


Everyone can now play a part in Hell's downfall. NEVRDEAD is returning fully loaded with more guns, demons, and death. Try it FREE now! You will be playing a unreleased, updated version! Enjoyed the demo - upgrade to the full game for more mayhem! Check out the monumental changes since launch and truly be a part of the product. Shape the future, the heavens will need it. *


* The demo build is a unreleased-updated version of the full game, the full game's updated version will release later this month. Only purchase now if you are looking to play an older build or be first to receive the 1.5 update *

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (or later)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5K+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M (or better)
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
